articles.title: Jimmy Hill, American killed in Ukraine, was 'true to his love' and stayed with sick partner - USA TODAY
articles.description: Jimmy Hill touched lives around the world through teaching and storytelling before he was killed in Ukraine this week, family and friends say.
articles.content:
